name: Modern Tank Fly Training
description:
Do you love army car games? Maybe military aircraft simulators? Want to fly your tank like an airplane? Modern Tank Fly Training is perfect for you! You can test your airplane pilot skills and tank driving ability at the same time.
FEATURES:
- Test your Tank Driving Skills
- Improve Airplane Flight Ability
- Stunning HD Graphics
- Beautiful Mountains
- Realistic and dynamic auto physics
